results.text: Ur twalav ara Öebbi Isselêay asigna, sinna, a t Izdi, sinna, a t Issem$weô? D$a a pwaliv ageffur a d iffe$ si zdaxel is. Isrusu d, seg idurar igenni, abruri. Ad Iwwet yis, win i S ihwan, a t Iveôôef $ef win i S ihwan. Tafat n lebôaq iS qôib a ppeglu s yiéôi.
Öebbi Ismizwar iv akked wass. Deg wayagi, s tidep, d aselmed i wid isâan iéôi.
Öebbi Ixleq akw lêayawan, seg waman. Garasen, illa win ippeênunufen $ef uâabbuv is, win ileêêun $ef sin ivaôôen, win ileêêun $ef kué. Ixelleq Öebbi ayen i S ihwan. Öebbi, s tidep, Izmer i yal cci.
Ni$ Nessader ed issekniyen iberrzen. Öebbi Inehhu win i S ihwan, ar ubrid uwqim.
Qqaôen: "numen s Öebbi akked Umazan, nu$ awal". Sinna, deffir waya, iwexxeô urbaâ segsen. Wigi ur llin d lmumnin.
Mi pwanecden ar Öebbi akked Umazan iS, ad Iêudd garasen, arbaâ segsen iwexxeô.
Ma sâan lêeqq, a d asen $uôes, d imvuâen.
